stories.title: Ask HN: Can someone explain the recent AWS outages to a layperson?
How to get your Teens or college-age Kids to take Omicron seriously

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I was thinking a lot about the decentralized web and reading about projects like solid, fission, and radicle etc.

We read a lot about people forgetting or losing their private wallet keys for bitcoin and we know commonly people forget their passwords. I was wondering if there is an implementation of a decentralized password recovery mechanism of some kind? Or maybe more generally a private key recovery mechanism?

If the vision of the decentralized web is for users to own their own data surely we will need some implementation of something like this.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are there implementations of decentralized password recovery mechanisms?
